Package edu.baylor.cs.se.hibernate.services

Class IssueService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.cs.se.hibernate.services.IssueService
  • @Transactional
@Service
public class IssueService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service Component for Issue that includes the business logic It has methods to save, update, delete issues and modify the comments and users involved in the issue
